ELTZ.ME.summary: Electrozink Public Joint-Stock Company produces and sells various non-ferrous metallurgy products in Russia. Its non-ferrous metallurgy product includes zinc, zinc-aluminum alloys, and cadmium; non-ferrous metallurgy chemical products, including sulfuric acids; and lead products. The company was founded in 1898 and is based in Verkhnyaya Pyshma, Russia. Electrozink Public Joint-Stock Company is a subsidiary of Ural Mining and Metallurgical Company.

GMKN.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Mining and Metallurgical Company Norilsk Nickel
GMKN.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Mining and Metallurgical Company Norilsk Nickel, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a metals and mining company in Europe, Asia, North and South America, Russia, and the CIS countries. The company operates through GMK Group, South Cluster, KGMK Group, NN Harjavalta, GRK Bystrinskoye, Other Mining, and Other Non-Metallurgical segments. It explores for, extracts, and refines ore and nonmetallic minerals; and sale of base and precious metals produced from ore. The company's products include nickel, palladium, copper, platinum, cobalt, rhodium, iridium, ruthenium, silver, gold, selenium, tellurium, sulphur, sodium sulfate, and sodium chloride. It is also involved in property and equipment rental, gas extraction and transportation, electricity production and distribution, construction, mining and metallurgy repairs, spare parts production, geological works and construction, distribution, research, fuel supply, river shipping, and airport businesses, as well as acts as an air company. Public Joint Stock Company Mining and Metallurgical Company Norilsk Nickel was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

MGNZ.ME.long_name: Open joint stock company Solikamsk magnesium works
MGNZ.ME.summary: Open joint stock company Solikamsk magnesium works manufactures and sells magnesium, chemical, and rare metals products for use in high-tech industries in Russia and internationally. The company's magnesium products include pure and alloy magnesium metals, potash, carnallite, calcium hypochlorite solution, and fluxes. It also provides chemical products, such as calcium chloride solution, liquid chlorine, lime, and lime slurry milk, as well as calcium strontium carbonate. In addition, the company offers carbonates and oxides of rare earths; chemical concentrates, pentachlorides, and pentoxides of niobium and tantalum; and titanium sponge and tetrachloride, as well as rare earths compounds and lithium niobates. Open joint stock company Solikamsk magnesium works was founded in 1936 and is based in Solikamsk, Russia.

NPTH.summary: Northern Potash Co., a junior resource company, engages in the identification, acquisition, and exploration of Potash properties in the former Soviet Union and Canada. The company has access to Potash and Phosphate properties in the Soviet Union and Canada. The company was formerly known as INREEX, Inc. and changed its name to Northern Potash Co. in July 2008. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

ROLO.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Rusolovo engages in the mining of tin ore in Russia. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

UNKL.ME.summary: Southern Urals Nickel Plant PJSC engages in the production and sale of nickel products in Russia. The company is based in Orsk, Russia.

VSMO.ME.summary: public stock company VSMPO-AVISMA Corporation produces and sells titanium in Russia and internationally. Its products include titanium, ferrotitanium, aluminum, and heat exchange equipment. The company serves aircraft construction, energy, oil and gas, building, medicine, and sports industries. public stock company VSMPO-AVISMA Corporation is based in Verkhnyaya Salda, Russia. As of April 5, 2021, the company operates as a subsidiary of Promishlennie Investitsii OOO.
